file_insights.changes_summary: Added hover effects to StyledLink component with animated underline animation
key_modifications: Added position: 'relative' to StyledLink base styles
Added transform-based animation with scaleX(0) to scaleX(1)
Enhanced :hover state with pseudo-element animation trigger

patterns_discovered.description: Used scaleX transform on ::after pseudo-element for efficient underline animation instead of width or left position changes
patterns_discovered.benefit: Better performance through GPU-accelerated transforms; transformOrigin: 'left' creates directional animation effect

patterns_discovered.description: Set content: '""' to create decorative underline element without additional DOM nodes
patterns_discovered.benefit: Keeps DOM tree clean while adding visual complexity

patterns_discovered.description: References theme.palette.primary.main for color consistency across hover and underline states
patterns_discovered.benefit: Maintains design system consistency and supports theme switching

patterns_discovered.description: Text color transition (150ms) differs from underline animation (200ms) for layered visual effect
patterns_discovered.benefit: Creates sophisticated UX with sequential animation feedback

gotchas_discovered.description: Parent StyledLink must have position: 'relative' for absolute positioning of ::after pseudo-element to work correctly
Without transformOrigin: 'left', scaleX animation would expand from center, creating different visual effect
gotchas_discovered.mitigation_applied: Explicitly set transformOrigin: 'left' for left-to-right animation

gotchas_discovered.description: Targeting '&::after' within '&:hover' requires proper MUI/styled-components nesting syntax
gotchas_discovered.mitigation_applied: Used correct nested selector syntax within theme object

approach_outcome.completion_status: First attempt successful - no revisions needed
approach_outcome.implementation_quality: High - implemented best-practice CSS animations with proper performance considerations

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting underline animation timing (200ms) and height (2px) to theme constants for consistency across similar components
Verify underline animation respects prefers-reduced-motion media query for users who prefer minimal motion
Document this hover effect pattern for reuse in other interactive link components
Monitor paint/composite metrics to confirm transform-based animation provides expected performance benefit over other approaches
